MajorClaims.MC1: following celebrities can be dangerous for the youth
MajorClaims.MC2: when young people follow celebrities, it affects their health as well as behavior in a negative way

Claims.C1: This has an overall effect on personality and future of an individual
Claims.C2: following celebrities blindly affects the health of adolescents
Claims.C3: these glamorous celebrities have a poor effect on the conduct of young people

Premises.P1: Many young people indulge themselves in drugs and start smoking at an early age
Premises.P2: in a survey carried out in a university, it was asked to students that why did they start smoking, then around forty percent of individuals answered that they wanted to look like their favorite screen actor while smoking cigarettes
Premises.P3: imitating celebrities has a negative influence on health of young individuals
Premises.P4: Adolescents follow not only the make up and attire of their favorite stars but also their behavior
Premises.P5: recently in a poll conducted by an American magazine it was found that most of the parents and teachers complain that teenagers use derogatory words and abusive language at home and at schools
Premises.P6: when youth follows celebrities it affects personality of young people in a bad way
